titleStmt.title: Two petitions from the kingdome of Ireland hvmbly presented to the honourable, the House of Co[m]mons now assembled in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Beecher, Henry, 17th cent.
White, Richard, 17th cent.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Petitions of Henry Beecher and Richard White for aid against the Irish rebels.
Attributed to Henry Beecher. cf. NUC pre-1956.
This item appears at reel 953:44 as Wing B1685, and at reel 901:44 as Wing T3498A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
